verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5986>Amos<s%>, who was among the <S%H5349>herdmen<s%> of <S%H8620>Tekoa<s%>, which he <S%H2372>saw<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, two <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7580>roar<s%> from <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and <S%H5414>utter<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and the <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> shall <S%H56>mourn<s%>, and the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> shall <S%H3001>wither<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, and for <S%H702>four<s%>, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the punishment thereof; because they have <S%H1758>threshed<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with threshing <S%H2742>instruments<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>: and: or, yea, for four turn: or, convert it, or, let it be quiet
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2371>Hazael<s%>, which shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H1130>Benhadad<s%>.

I will <S%H7665>break<s%> also the <S%H1280>bar<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> from the <S%H1237>plain<s%> of <S%H206>Aven<s%>, and him that <S%H8551>holdeth<s%> the <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> <S%H1040><s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> shall go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> unto <S%H7024>Kir<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. the plain: or, Bikathaven the house: or, Betheden

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, and for <S%H702>four<s%>, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the punishment thereof; because they carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> the <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H1546>captivity<s%>, to deliver them <S%H5462>up<s%> to <S%H123>Edom<s%>: away captive: or, them away with an entire
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, which shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof:

And I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> from <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>, and him that <S%H8551>holdeth<s%> the <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> from <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%>, and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>: and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>, and for <S%H702>four<s%>, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the punishment thereof; because they delivered <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H1546>captivity<s%> to <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and <S%H2142>remembered<s%> not the <S%H251>brotherly<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>: the brotherly: Heb. the covenant of brethren
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>, which shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and for <S%H702>four<s%>, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the punishment thereof; because he did <S%H7291>pursue<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and did cast <S%H7843>off<s%> all <S%H7356>pity<s%>, and his <S%H639>anger<s%> did <S%H2963>tear<s%> <S%H5703>perpetually<s%>, and he <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H5678>wrath<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>: did cast: Heb. corrupted his compassions
But I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> upon <S%H8487>Teman<s%>, which shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> of <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; For <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and for <S%H702>four<s%>, I will not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> the punishment thereof; because they have ripped <S%H1234>up<s%> the women with <S%H2030>child<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, that they might <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> their <S%H1366>border<s%>: ripped: or, divided the mountains

But I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%>, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof, with <S%H8643>shouting<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle<s%>, with a <S%H5591>tempest<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%>:
And their <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, he and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
